flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This improved rubber band gun can be used for more dangerous missions!
guide.introduction_rendered:
This improved rubber band gun can be used for more dangerous missions!

Relevant parts
  • Rubber bands
  • Fork
  • Spring clothespin

lines.text: Place clothespin on fork then put elastic bands around them to hold them together.
lines.text_raw: Place clothespin on fork then put elastic bands around them to hold them together.

lines.text: Now, to load it, put an elastic band through the prongs then to the jaw of the clothespin as pictured.
lines.text_raw: Now, to load it, put an elastic band through the prongs then to the jaw of the clothespin as pictured.

lines.text: Have fun with your very own improved rubber band gun!
lines.text_raw: Have fun with your very own improved rubber band gun!

guide.summary: This improved rubber band gun can be used for more dangerous missions!
